name: Eastral
description:
A short adventure of a new president trying to unite allied countries. Complete minigames and lead Eastral - a promising space program - to success. Show everyone that there is a huge potential in the East-Central Europe!

Made by Aleksander Błaszkiewicz and Dominik Piotrowicz. Molded by fun and love in Unity.

Assets:

  • Construction ambient sound (CC 4.0) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nob1bpSXyrg&t=1s&ab_channel=TheSoundGallery
  • UI Pack (CC0 1.0) https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack
  • UI Sounds (CC0 1.0) https://www.kenney.nl/assets/interface-sounds
  • Fonts (CC0 1.0) https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
  • Universal Sound FX https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256
  • Fruits and vegetables icons (free) https://jordizzle.itch.io/farming-game-asset-pack-1
  • Bakery icons (free) https://k-ramstack.itch.io/bakery-asset-pack
  • Galaxy photos (free) https://www.google.com/sky/
